General.Name: Cyient Limited
General.Description: Cyient Limited provides geospatial, engineering design, information technology (IT) solutions, and data analytic services in North America, Europe, and the Asia Pacific. The company operates through Services and Design Led Manufacturing segments. It offers engineering services, such as systems, mechanical, electrical, manufacturing, plant, network, and field engineering, as well as aftermarket, embedded systems, and intellectual property and allied services. In addition, the company provides digitization of drawings and maps, computer aided design/engineering, design and modelling, repair development engineering, reverse engineering application software development, software products development, consulting, analytics, and implementation services. It serves aerospace, defense, rail transportation, communications, utilities, hi-tech, semiconductor, energy, industrial, plant engineering, geospatial, medical technology, healthcare, automotive, mobility, mining, natural resources, and digital sectors. Cyient Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Hyderabad, India.
